file_content.text: Hey. Master Jedi. Talk to me for a second.
Hey. Soldier. Give me a second.
I know you. Talk for a second, Captain?
Look at this group. Got a second?
I'm supposedly on leave right now. So this isn't official, you understand, just talk between friends.
You're making me suspicious.
[Flirt] Let's be friends.
I have a minute.
Of course, sir.
Not official. Got it.
Don't worry, it's nothing sketchy. Just politics being politics.
Cute but really barking up the wrong tree.
Don't worry, everyone knows how important you are.
Thanks, appreciate it.
Short version: Nar Shaddaa is heating up again. Imps are making major moves, but officially, the military is staying out of it. Hutt neutrality and all that.
So I am not here telling you how needed you are on Nar Shaddaa. And I'm not telling you we might lose this war because of what's going on there.
Agreed. You're not here.
I need specifics, Major.
Ugh. I hate Nar Shaddaa.
Nar Shaddaa isn't there for liking, it's there for keeping out of Imp hands.
Glad we understand each other.
Head to Nar Shaddaa. Talk to the Senate liaison, Deera Ulyette. She'll meet you in the spaceport. But hurry, I don't think diplomacy is going to win this battle.
Of course, Major.
Just minding my own business. You?
Nar Shaddaa's not getting any less urgent.
